title: Calcium +
long_description: CALCIUM +Â helps to keep pool water perfectly balanced to prevent the corrosion of metal surfaces. Balancing calcium hardness will also increase swimmer comfort and protect pool equipment.
short_description: BENEFITS Helps prevent corrosion of metal surfaces Increases swimmer comfort FORMATS 1.8 kg, 4 kg, 8 kg and 20 kg

characteristics.title: Recommended levels
characteristics.text: Calcium hardness should be between 200 and 300 ppm for pool water. Levels are determined with a test kit.

characteristics.title: Application method
characteristics.text: CALCIUM + must be dissolved in a bucket of water before adding to pool water.

characteristics.title: Instructions
characteristics.text: When opening the pool, check calcium hardness with a test kit. Make the necessary adjustments according to the application method and recommended dosage. Pool can be used immediately after adding the product.

dosage.specifications: To raise calcium hardness by 10 ppm, dissolve 130 g of CALCIUM + per 10,000 L of pool water in a bucket of water.

columns.name: POOL SIZE
rows: TO RAISE CALCIUM HARDNESS BY 10 ppm

warning: DO NOT apply the product when people are in the pool.
